654990.name: Dude Simulator
654990.description: Dude Simulator is an open world sandbox game. This is a life simulator. The main objective is to enjoy what you are doing. You can do whatever you want. You can explore the town, find money and spend it to buy something, kill someone, enter any building – just everything that can be done in real life. You can live a regular life of an ordinary person or you can do any crazy things, play jokes on other people, and so on – it is all up to you.
654990.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 简体中文, 韩语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 日语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
